)
mapper.select:
SELECT m.term_cate AS termCate, m.term_order AS termOrder, m.term_title AS termTitle, m.term_reg_dy AS termRegDy,
(SELECT MAX(h.thist_version) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestVersion,
(SELECT MAX(h.thist_reg_dy) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestRegDy
FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m ORDER BY m.term_cate, m.term_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TERMS_AGREE_HIST( agree_cust_code, agree_term_order, agree_term_cate, agree_yn, agree_dt ) VALUES( #{agreeCustCode}, #{agreeTermOrder}, #{agreeTermCate}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT m.term_cate AS termCate, m.term_order AS termOrder, m.term_title AS termTitle, h.thist_content AS termContent FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m JOIN TB_TERMS_HIST h ON h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order WHERE m.term_cate = #{cate} AND h.thist_version = ( SELECT MAX(h2.thist_version) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h2 WHERE h2.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h2.thist_term_order = m.term_order ) ORDER BY m.term_order

SELECT m.term_cate AS termCate, m.term_order AS termOrder, m.term_title AS termTitle, m.term_reg_dy AS termRegDy, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_version) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestVersion, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_reg_dy) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestRegDy FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m ORDER BY m.term_cate, m.term_order OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT m.term_cate AS termCate, m.term_order AS termOrder, m.term_title AS termTitle, m.term_reg_dy AS termRegDy, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_version) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestVersion, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_reg_dy) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestRegDy FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m
AND m.term_cate = #{keyword}

ORDER BY m.term_cate, m.term_order OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
